TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Cilo'ohay, title = Cilo'ohay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cilo'ohay} }

S.FORM: Cilo'ohay Itiniay i Fenglin Cen no Hualien ko Cilo'ohay a niyaro', 43 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 102 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 42% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 43 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 58% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 59 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 36%, Paiwan 1%, Truku 2%, roma 3%.

Cilo'ohay Itiniay i Fenglin Cen no Hoalien ko Cilo'ohay a niyaro', 43 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 102 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 42% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 43 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 58% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 59 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 36%, Paiwan 1%, Troko 2%, roma 3%.
